data.title: Raúl García López

His professional career started in... Read More
data.text:
In his current position as Watson and Cloud Platform Sales Manager for Spain, Portugal, Greece and Israel, Raúl leads a team that help companies in their journey to Cloud as well as in the development of innovation and digital transformation projects, especially in Cloud, Data, Blockchain and Artificial Intelligence areas.

His professional career started in Lotus Development. After joining IBM, Raúl has developed much of his career in Software Business Unit, supporting and helping a wide variety of customers and managing the relationship with the ecosystem, integrators, wholesalers, etc … He also led negotiations with large corporations both locally and internationally at corporate software agreements.
